snippet.title: Miley Cyrus hacker in MySpace spam ringtone scam
snippet.description:
Miley Cyrus hacker in MySpace spam ringtone scam
A teenager already suspected of breaking into the Gmail account of actress Miley Cyrus and swiping candid pictures also hacked into MySpace profiles of other celebrities. Suspected hacker Josh Holly, 19, also allegedly broke into the online accounts of music stars including Rihanna, Chris Brown, Linkin Park and Fall Out Boy, â€¦
John Leyden, 26 Feb 2009
